The teaching is based on lectures and tutorial which are coupled with the laboratory classes as
On successful completion of this unit
1. Apply knowledge of mathematics to examine the behaviour of electric and magnetic fields
and relate them to suitable applications.
2. Interpret Maxwell's equations and associated Laplace
3. Describe electric and magnetic properties of metals
4. Select and use appropriate tools to complete electrical and magnetic fields related
5. Communicate their work effectively in teams.
